termination of this Agreement, Distributor shall not, and shall not  engage any third party to: (a) restrict, modify, or reconfigure in any manner any of the Products that have been installed by End Users  (such End Users, "Installed Base End Users") in connection with this Agreement; or (b) engage in activities that encourage Installed  Base End Users to modify, uninstall or reconfigure any or the Products.
